name: Special Twilight Years
description:
If you click Quit, the game will crash. Don't worry, refresh the page, and you will be good to go!

You will act as a nurse and push the different patients in the hospital to the designated location.

This game is a single-player puzzle game that contains a total of 7 levels. The difficulty of the level gradually increases. You can find a heart-wrenching story through playing. The average time for a walkthrough is 45 minutes.

Walkthrough videos for every level are on my Youtube page. if you have any problems, please visit https://www.youtube.com/@louisproduction2331/videos

All my games are nonprofit！
